boardgame.name: Darklight: Memento Mori
boardgame.description: Darklight: Memento Mori brings old-school dungeon crawler action with original dark-gothic settings and deep strategic combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Four Accursed (the players) bound together by a twist of fate, must fight their way though randomly generated dungeons to find lost treasure and acquire the souls of those they slay to extend their own life and use it as currency to survive in a world left in ruins by the coming of demons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player will take on the role of one of the four dark heroes which must survive and find their way to the Quest Room in order to complete a specific objective and win their current mission. Many things will try to stop them from terrifying and grotesque monsters to unexpected traps or events lurking secretly in the dungeons._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For those wishing to expand their playing experience, the game continues through hazardous journeys where the Accursed must resolve player driven decisions which can prove fatal when the wrong choice is made. If they were to survive the journey, they would find a settlement where they can gather their strength, buy new equipment or participate in the many activities available such as jousting while building their own reputation to improve their standing with the locals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Darklight: Memento Mori is a living experience within a dark, mysterious world full of deception and secrets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 014 – Dead of Winter vs Robinson Crusoe
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Darklight: Memento Mori – Boss Pack Supplement

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Fulfillment is expected in Q1, 2017. This listing includes a copy of Darklight: Memento Mori from the Kickstarter campaign plus all stretch goals. The stretch goals reached during the campaign include: Revenant Pack Nephilim Pack Courtesan Pack Possessed Chest 50 Loot Cars x6 Faceless Ones Necromancer Pack 50 Environment Cards x3 Daughters of Libithia Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher. We also have the Complete Boss Pack, which includes all 5 paid add-on boss miniatures and cards, for $59.95. Please let us know if you would like us to add this when you place your order. Please contact us if you have any questions.

Note: Free Shipping for orders over $99 within the Continental United States. ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Fulfillment is expected in Q1, 2017. Please contact us if you have any questions.

Kickstarter Pledge, including: Base Game Exploration Pack Supplement Adventurers Game Supplement as well as 2 extra add on miniatures for: Cultist Overloard Skorn Warlord Everything is new and unplayed. Meet up in Vienna is also a possibility. Payment preferably via Bank transfer (IBAN). Paypal is possible, but if not done via _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;friends _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; include an extra 5€.

A new, in-hand copy of Darklight: Memento Mori Kickstarter Edition (full Accursed Pledge Level) including all stretch goals. Please note: While this item is brand new, the shrink wrap of the core game was removed at the distribution center and it was repackaged, this was done with all Kickstarter copies of the game. I verified that the game box is indeed undamaged (Unlike many boxes which arrived with split corners or similar issues) but did not open the game itself. The 2 expansion boxes are shrinkwrapped. This package will fall into the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;10kg shipping range of DHL. (Addendum) To clarify, this listing includes: The Core Game The Adventurers Pack The Exploration Pack
Kickstarter Edition of the Game including all the expansions and stretch goal. Does not include the boss miniatures.

Darklight Kickstarter Version AND in addition WITH all Boss Miniatures. So you get: 1x Base Game (reward) 1x Adventurers Pack (reward) 1x Exploration Pack (reward) 1x Boss Pack Boxes New and in shrink. Shipping (DHL, insured and tracked): Germany 8,50€ Europe 16-25€ USA 37-54€ Ask for individuel shipping quotes

What I paid: Base Game: $119 Euros Shipping: $41 Euros Expansions: $99.98 Euros Shipping: $37.98 Euros Total: $286.96 Euros = $366.11 USD Up for sale is the new KS game Darklight Memento Mori, in hand here in Washington State. I purchased this from a German retailer and paid to ship it to the states. Then I found sealed copies of the Adventurer and Exploration packs on here from a fellow BGG member and purchased those and had them shipped over from Germany as well. Ironically, after these 2 transactions I won an eBay auction for the same stuff plus the boss miniatures which I was really after. Now I have 2 sets and obviously only need 1. At $350 I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not even covering my costs due to the shipping costs from Germany. Everything is brand new; expansions are sealed. Base game is NOT sealed (it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not sealed upon arrival, none are). I can typically ship within 1 business day of payment, this will be rather expensive to ship due to weight and size but I kept the packaging from the previous shipper so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll arrive nicely padded safe and sound.
Includes: - Base Game (opened, never played) - Boss Pack (opened, never played) - Adventurers Pack (in shrink) - Exploration Pack (in shrink) Bank transfer only.

Darklight: Memento Mori, Kickstarter, Accursed Pledge Level, includes: - Base game - Exploration ExpansionPack - Adventures Expansion Pack New in Shrink , Base game box was shipped was shipped in shrink wrap but is unopened, base game box has some some minor cosmetic damage but was like that when I opened the box, Shipping and PayPal fees payed by Buyer

Game is new in shrink. Base game did not come in shrink, only in a separate box. There is some cosmetic damage to the base game that was from shipping. Shipping to the west coast will be expensive. You can message me for a quote. Includes: Darklight Base Game Adventurers Pack Supplement Exploration Pack Supplement Boss pack Supplement

This is everything, brand new in shrink. Core game (sealed in the large cardboard box) Dark Master kit (double map tiles, doors with bases and map cards) *Shrink wrapped to the left of core box in picture Exploration pack supplement Boss pack supplement (This arrived without shrink, but is taped sealed, minor corner ding on box as shown in picture) Adventurers pack supplement Custom dice (on top of core box in picture) Everything is heavy, around 26lbs. Expect the shipping to be steep. I am willing to do local pickup if possible. (zip code: 55972) Buyer pays shipping. I will get exact shipping cost for confirmed buyer. Thank you!

Accursed KS pledge. This does include the basegame + exploration and adventurers pack ! Game is opened, punched and all cards sleeved but unplayed. The base box cover is split at a corner from original transport. Paypal (Family _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Friends or +5€) or bank transfer. Shipping (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 6kg) is 6€ to germany or 20€ to EU.

Basisspiel. Sehr guter Zustand des Inhalts. Ich habe ein eigenes Sortiersystem aus Foamcore gebastelt, das es deutlich vereinfacht und beschleunigt das Spiel aufzubauen und anschließend wieder im Karton zu verpacken. Die Karten für Helden und Monster sind zum Schutz laminiert. Versand nur innerhalb Deutschlands. Kosten für Wunschversand kommen zum Kaufpreis noch hinzu. Gerne auch direkt Abholung in Dortmund. Bei PayPal-Zahlung entweder mit der Option Familie/Freunde ansonsten kommen PayPal-Gebühren noch mit drauf.
Kickstarter Accursed Pledge. The Game is like new, I only opened the Main Box and looked at the Components, every other thing is still wrapped, Punchboards not touched etc.

The only thing I ask is a little patience with shipping. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a ginormous box and I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have the original one as I shipped a few games in it already. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship as fast as possible, but I will have to make sure I have a box big enough to do it safely.

Sale includes base game and Adventurer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Pack and Exploration Pack expansions. Opened, sorted and played twice. Complete and in excellent condition, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include the Plano box holding the tokens. Will give $25 towards shipping for buyer freudianslip27

Those that came in shrink are still in shrink, and all materials are unpunched. Expansions included!!!! This also includes the adventurers expansion and exploration expansions!

Punched and sorted. The expansion cards are still in shrink wrap. Includes Adventurers, Exploration, and Boss Pack. Page 7/8 of the rulebook is ripped but I have printed color copies of the pages included with the rule book. Shipping extra.

This includes the base game, explorers pack and the adventure pack, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m open to price negotiation! The core box has been unsealed to check components but is new. Ask for shipping cost!

New Darklight will ALL expansions and stretch goals EXCEPT dungeon master kit. Fully Painted to high quality standard! I ship with 3 business days of purchase, with tracking. I accept paypal / google wallet / venmo for any international buyers, I only accept google wallet or venmo.

Accursed pledge and Boss Pack expansion (all Boss minis). Never played, but opened and organized into baggies etc. All models, chits, cards etc. accounted for and in mint condition. Price includes shipping and handling. PayPal or Venmo accepted

I have played this four times. It is absolutely amazing and the miniatures are out of this world good. I love everything about this game. It is literally an RPG in a box I could go on forever about this. Even in the four times I have played each time lasted quite a while leveling my character going to different towns and trying to up my rep to get bonuses and going on side quests and continuing on the main story when I felt like it or wanted better equipment. Everything in box is in perfect condition and boxed up nice and neat. Your probably asking yourself, why if he loves it so much is he selling it? Good Question. I purchased this two weeks ago but since then our department got laid off and looking for new work. This box is HEAVY!!! This is absolutly a steal for the price. THis is the Retail version however there are a TON of miniatures and i believe you can get some add-ons from their site. Act quick im sure for this price it will be gone asap. Please keep in mind i only accept pay pal./

Pictures here https://imgur.com/a/C4yqJEt Never used, everything in shrink wrap only boxes opened to inspect content. Price negotiable Includes Base game Exploration Pack Adventures Pack Boss miniatures Custom Dice Extra tiles , cards and doorways, also know as the Dark Master Kit. Will ship worldwide - shipping is not included in the price.

Darklight Memento Mori with expansions in excellent condition. Accursed level pledge with addons: Includes base game, Adventurers pack, Explorers pack, and Boss Pack with all original packaging. Also includes extra pad of character sheets. Everything is unplayed. Ships from 20017
